name: Medieval Animated Door
description:
This was a short University project designed to teach the basics of using 3D Studio Max and the workflows that come along with it. 

This is not a full game nor is there really any objective other than opening the door (there is a sequence to it!). It is primarily to serve as a record of this project and as a showcase of the assets.

If anyone is interested i'll put together an asset pack of all the models in this scene, just drop a comment down below and i'll see what I can do.
